page.title: 01OUR NEW AMBULANCE STATION
page.content:
We are having a new ambulance station built in Burnham-on-Sea right next door to St. Andrew's School, so the children spend much of their playtimes watching the builders at work.
It will provide garages for four ambulances and there will be eight rooms in the ambulance station. These include male and female changing rooms, crews' duty room, utility room and blanket store.
The new ambulance station is due for completion on 16th December 1985, and will cost around Â£180,000. It is necessary to replace the existing facilities at the Burnham War Memorial Hospital which are no longer adequate.
